text: Ara allah yaderake patha nirdesa karena tara to pathaprapta ebam yaderake tini pathabhrasta karena apani kakhano tadera jan'ya tamke chara an'ya ka'uke abhibhabaka pabena na. Ara kiyamatera dina amara taderake samabeta karaba tadera mukhe bhara diye cala abasthaya andha, boba o badhira kare [1]. Tadera abasasthala jahannama; yakhana'i ta stimita habe takhana'i amara tadera jan'ya agunera sikha brd'dhi kare deba
